Plot: Leigh has made a film about how Darren and Joe met and fell in love. Due to its exaggerated nature, personal complications ensue.
Title: More Scenes from a Gay Marriage
Writer: Matt Riddlehoover, Ethan James, Thashana McQuiston, Cliff Burr
Actors: Charlie David, Rett Terrell, Matt Riddlehoover, Jared Allman
